Oceanside Museum of Art | OMA

2025-26 Artist Alliance Biennial
2025-26 Artist Alliance Biennial
Celebrating 53 standout works showcasing the depth, diversity, and vision of OMAs Artist Alliance community. On view through March 8, 2026.
Learn More
Modern Simplicity: The Architecture of Irving J. Gill in Oceanside
Modern Simplicity: The Architecture of Irving J. Gill in Oceanside
Explore the legacy of visionary architect Irving J. Gill, whose modern, minimalist designs helped shape Oceansides architectural identity and continue to inspire contemporary design today.
Learn More
Surf Art: Exploring Southern California's Coastal Culture
Surf Art: Exploring Southern California's Coastal Culture
From resin and murals to surfboards, sculpture, and fabric, artists expand surf culture into new realms.
Learn More
Rent OMA
Host Your Next Event at OMA
Make your occasion unforgettable in a truly unique setting. Delight your guests with local exhibitions, contemporary architecture, and interactive touches like mini paint workshops, festive crafts, or live art experiences.
Learn More
Francisco Eme: Future Rituals & La eco-resistencia
Francisco Eme: Future Rituals & La eco-resistencia
Blending ancestral traditions with contemporary media, Eme invites viewers to reconnect with nature and rediscover the balance between humanity and the living world.
Learn More

BRINGING PEOPLE TOGETHER TO EXPLORE THE ART AND STORIES OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA ARTISTS.

New Member Welcome Event Oceanside Museum Of Art 704 Pier View Way

sat17jan10:30 am12:00 pmNew Member Welcome EventMEMBER: FREE10:30 am - 12:00 pm

Time

(Saturday) 10:30 am - 12:00 pm

Location

Oceanside Museum Of Art

704 Pier View Way

Event Details

Are you a fresh addition to our community? Come join us for our New Member Welcome! It's a fantastic chance to enjoy complimentary refreshments, meet

Event Details

Are you a fresh addition to our community? Come join us for our New Member Welcome! It's a fantastic chance to enjoy complimentary refreshments, meet both new and long-standing members, discover volunteer prospects, and indulge in a private docent tour of our ongoing exhibitions. If you can't make it this time, watch out for future New Member Welcome events on our calendar. Whether you've been a member for a week or a year, we're thrilled to have you join us and embrace a stronger sense of belonging.
If you have any questions, please email Katelyn Johnson, Membership Manager.
Ticket Prices:
Member: Free

CalendarGoogleCal

Taste of Art Workshop | OKeefe and the Exploded View Oceanside Museum Of Art 704 Pier View Way

thu29jan5:30 pm7:30 pmTaste of Art Workshop | OKeefe and the Exploded ViewAdult: $65 | Member: $505:30 pm - 7:30 pm

Time

(Thursday) 5:30 pm - 7:30 pm

Location

Oceanside Museum Of Art

704 Pier View Way

Event Details

Kick off your weekend with a bite-sized happy hour version of our renowned Studio Arts workshops. Gather with friends in an artistic space designed to amplify

Event Details

Kick off your weekend with a bite-sized happy hour version of our renowned Studio Arts workshops. Gather with friends in an artistic space designed to amplify your creative side.
Join arts educator Robin Douglas, as we dip our toes into the work of celebrated artists over drinks and nibbles, followed by a rapid demonstration of their styles. Youll then be guided to interpret these artists and create your own singular, spectacular work of art. Well help you express your unique style and ensure you have a blast doing it.

OKeefe and the Exploded View

OKeeffes paintings continue to inspire contemporary art making. Come and explore her sense of color and expanded compositions. Paint an exploded view of a natural object. Paintings will be large and loose, in natural and abstracted colors.
All levels of experience are encouraged to participate. OMA provides food, drinks and supplies; all you have to do is get yourself out of work, grab your friends, and have fun!
Ticket Prices:
Adult: $65
Member: $50
Space is limited. Register today!
